movies.title: Thermae Romae II
movies.plot: A sequel to the comedy Thermae Romae, an adaptation of Yamazaki Mari's popular comic. A Roman Empire bathhouse architect discovers he is able to travel through time when in need of inspiration. Things get messy, however, when he finds himself wrapped up in a conflict that could divide the Roman Empire.
movies.simplePlot: A sequel to the comedy Thermae Romae, an adaptation of Yamazaki Mari's popular comic. A Roman Empire bathhouse architect discovers he is able to travel through time when in need of ...

biography.bio: Hiroshi Abe was born on June 22, 1964 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Still Walking (2008), Chocolate (2008) and Godzilla 2000 (1999).
biography.name: Hiroshi Abe

biography.bio: Born in Tokyo, Japan in 1985, Aya Ueto received her first break in August 1997 when, at the age of 11, she won the Special Jury Prize at the 7th All-Japan Bishoujo Contest. After this initial success, she tried her hand at both acting and singing, appearing in various minor TV drama roles, as well as a low budget action movie, and formed a short-lived pop quartet, "Z-1", with other winners of the Bishoujo Contest. After her passionate portrayal of a high school student with Gender Identity Disorder in the 6th series of the long-running classroom drama Kinpachi sensei, 3-nen B-gumi Kinpachi Sensei (1979), endeared her to the Japanese nation, she was able to pursue a solo music career with her first single, "Pureness", released in August 2002. It was this performance that also convinced cult movie director Ryûhei Kitamura to cast her in the title role of Azumi (2003). With the film's release date coinciding with the sale of her debut album "AYAUETO" in the spring of 2003, Aya was set for super-stardom. Her famous smile has since earned her increasing numbers of commercial contracts and magazine covers - all important exposure for any idol - combined with starring roles in a number of popular television dramas have meant she is rarely out of the limelight and has cemented her position as one of Japan's top entertainers.
biography.name: Aya Ueto

biography.bio: Kazuki Kitamura was born on July 17, 1969 in Osaka, Japan as Yasushi Kitamura. He is an actor, known for Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004), Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003) and The Raid 2 (2014).
biography.name: Kazuki Kitamura

biography.bio: Kai Shishido was born on September 4, 1966 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ultraman Max (2005), Thermae Romae (2012) and Azumi 2: Death or Love (2005).
biography.name: Kai Shishido

biography.bio: Riki Takeuchi was born on January 4, 1964 in Oita, Japan as Chikara Takeuchi. He is an actor and producer, known for Dead or Alive (1999), Last Life in the Universe (2003) and Big Man Japan (2007).
biography.name: Riki Takeuchi

biography.bio: Midoriko Kimura is an actress, known for Our Little Sister (2015), Memories of Matsuko (2006) and Thermae Romae (2012).
biography.name: Midoriko Kimura

biography.bio: Katsuya is an actor, known for Thermae Romae (2012), Tomorrow's Joe (2011) and Ichi (2008).
biography.name: Katsuya

biography.bio: Tarô Akebono is an actor, known for Thermae Romae II (2014), Ikkyû san (2012) and Jikkuri kiitarô : Star kinkyô maruhi hôkoku (2016).
biography.name: Tarô Akebono

biography.bio: Katsunori Kotoôshû is an actor, known for Thermae Romae II (2014), Nakai no mado (2012) and Downtown DX (1993).
biography.name: Katsunori Kotoôshû

biography.bio: Minoru Shiraki was born on May 6, 1934 in Yatsuka, Shimane, Japan. He is an actor, known for Bakumatsu: Tenamonya daizôdô (1967), Tenamonya Tôkaidô (1966) and Thermae Romae II (2014).
biography.name: Minoru Shiraki

biography.bio: Tomoko Matsushima was born on July 10, 1945 in China. She is an actress, known for Magic Boy (1959), Gekko kamen - Satan no tsume (1958) and Sazae-san no seishun (1957).
biography.name: Tomoko Matsushima

biography.bio: Tomio Suga is an actor, known for Thermae Romae (2012), Der grosse Sommer (2016) and Thermae Romae II (2014).
biography.name: Tomio Suga

biography.bio: Hachirô Ika is an actor, known for Thermae Romae (2012), Thermae Romae II (2014) and The Big Tits Dragon (2010).
biography.name: Hachirô Ika

biography.bio: Bunmei Tobayama was born on January 11, 1947 in Nagano, Japan. He is an actor, known for Hole in the Sky (2001), Saejima Nao: Ijo kofun (1989) and Thermae Romae (2012).
biography.name: Bunmei Tobayama

biography.bio: Tarô Iwate is an actor, known for Thermae Romae (2012), Thermae Romae II (2014) and A Snake of June (2002).
biography.name: Tarô Iwate

camera: Red Epic, Zeiss Ultra Prime and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
